subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Could the Heat’s LeBron James have been the player to resurrect the Knicks? He was not, as it turned out, as ready, willing and capable as Amar’e Stoudemire.
snippet: Could the Heat’s LeBron James have been the player to resurrect the Knicks? He was not, as it turned out, as ready, willing and capable as Amar’e Stoudemire.
